name: Comet Strike
text:
Void all cards in play, crypts, and hands.

Each champion gains [L0][R10].

Each champion gains 10 [DIAMOND].

Each champion gains 10 [RUBY].

Each champion gains 10 [SAPPHIRE].
flavor: A massive crystalline meteor hit Entrath near its northern terrestrial pole 2300 years ago.

name: Mastery of Time
text:
Take an additional turn after this one.

Void this.
flavor: Do not hesitate. Time never does.

name: Eye of Creation
text: Reveal the top X cards of your deck. Put each revealed troop into play. Put the remaining cards into your deck.
flavor: Titania is the Primal of Wild Magic.

name: Kill
text: Destroy target non-artifact troop.

name: Comet Strike
text:
Void all cards in play, crypts, and hands.

Each champion gains [L0][R10].

Each champion gains 10 [DIAMOND].

Each champion gains 10 [RUBY].

Each champion gains 10 [SAPPHIRE].
flavor: A massive crystalline meteor hit Entrath near its northern terrestrial pole 2300 years ago.

name: Atrophy
text:
Target troop gets -1[ATK]/-1[DEF].

Draw a card.
flavor: "When the heretic is weakened by his own blasphemy, he has only himself to blame." -Inquisitor Thist

name: Blood Aura
text: Target troop gets +1[ATK]/+1[DEF] and Lifedrain.
flavor: Blood Magic first appeared approximately 100,000 years after the creation of Wild Magic.

name: Call the Grave
text: Put target troop from a crypt into your hand.
flavor: Everything serves a purpose, but dead things can often serve many purposes.

name: Corrupted Afterlife
text: Revert and transform up to three target troops in a crypt into Zombies and put them into play under your control.
flavor: Many fear death until they realize there are fates that are far worse.

name: Curse of Oblivion
text: Target opposing card on the chain. Void each other card with the same name from its controller's hand, deck, and crypt.

name: Extinction
text: Destroy all troops.
flavor: He who refuses to learn deserves extinction.

name: Infernal Professor
text: Put a random non-resource card from your deck into your hand. It gets cost -[(2)] and "At the start of your turn, if this is in your hand, it deals 2 damage to you".
flavor: "In two weeks, you bring back book. Late fee is one severed finger for each day you don't return book. It does not have to be your finger." -The Professor

name: Inquisition
text: Look at target opposing champion's hand. Choose a revealed non-resource card. They discard that card.
flavor: Vennen warlocks organize public rituals where "heretics" are tortured and executed.

name: Life Siphon
text:
Lifedrain

Deal X damage to target opposing champion.
flavor: "Hide behind as many troops as you like. Your life is still mine to devour."

name: Misfortune
text: Deal 2 damage to each opposing champion, and they each choose and discard two cards.
flavor: "Fortune knocks but once, but misfortune has much more patience."

name: Kill
text: Destroy target non-artifact troop.

name: Necessary Sacrifice
text:
As an additional cost to play this, sacrifice a troop.

Draw three cards.
flavor: Executions in shin'hare society are never a public spectacle. They are too common to be a curiosity.

name: Relentless Corruption
text: Put the top ESC:1 card of target opposing champion's deck into your hand. The thresholds of those cards all become [BLOOD]. Put this into your deck.Escalate: 1 all your Relentless Corruptions in all zones.

name: Shadow Rend
text: You Get "When a troop you control deals damage to an opposing champion, that champion chooses and discards a card." this turn.

name: Sorrow
text: Troops get -1[ATK]/-1[DEF] this turn.
flavor: "Suffering is a pool in which we continuously drown." - Alwyn
